Survey App

Realtime survey using React with a Socket.io based Node.js/Express backend.

Visit the website

About this project

This project was created to meet a need I had as I mentored youth in the era of meeting through video calls. Many teenagers don't engage willingly using their microphones, so I created a survey app to pose questions and interact with student responses in real-time. To acheive bi-directional event-based communication I built the backend from scratch using Node.js with the Socket.io library. I also used the Material-ui library extensively to speed up styling of react components. Some challenges I had to overcome was understanding React hooks especially useEffect together with Socket.io event-based architecture. Also learning to use Material-ui globably to get styles across different components and improve reuse.

Technical Sheet

Core technologies I used to build this project:

  • React
  • Node.JS
  • Express
  • Sockets.io
  • Material-UI
  • JSS
